description: This color image follows the one published in Ha here https://astrob.in/357075/0/ This is the second season that I photograph this region that could be seen as a great fresco. I took the opportunity to add time but the conditions were not ideal. In this constellation of Ara, some can see a titanic space fight between Dragons. Others imagine the fantastic eternal battle between good and evil. Other people think they recognize the Hand of God, like the painting of Michelangelo. Personally, I prefer to see a bear, in the center, under the benevolent look of his parents, in the upper right. It is a vast area of star formation that ionize, illuminate and shape the forms of these gaseous clouds. ---------- Dans cette constellation de l'Autel, certains peuvent y voir un combat spatial titanesque entre des Dragons. D'autres pensent reconnaître la Main de Dieu, à l'instar de la fresque de Michel-Ange. Personnellement, je préfère y voir un ourson, tout au centre, sous le regard bienveillant de ses parents, en haut à droite. C'est une vaste région de formation d'étoiles qui ionisent, illuminent et façonnent les formes de ces nuages gazeux.
title: NGC 6188 - Space Fighting Dragons in Ara - LHa-RHaGB
